analysis.description:
Reentrancy in DWBTPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#596-625):
	External calls:
	- token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#615-616)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endAt (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol)
	- state (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol)

Reentrancy in DWBTPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#596-625):
	External calls:
	- token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#615-616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collectedWei (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#617-620)

DWBTPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#596-625) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#615-616)

Reentrancy in DWBTPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#596-625):
	External calls:
	- token.icoInvestment(msg.sender,itokens) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#615-616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investments (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#622-623)

BaseICO.start (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#389-399) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(endAt_ > block.timestamp && state == State.Inactive) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#390-391)

BaseICO.tune (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#430-455) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endAt_ > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#435-439)

DWBTPreICO.touch (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#580-596) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= endAt (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#589-595)

DWBTPreICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#596-625) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(state == State.Active && block.timestamp <= endAt && msg.value >= lowCapTxWei && msg.value <= hardCapTxWei && collectedWei + msg.value <= hardCapWei) (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#598-606)

elements.expression: require(bool)(state == State.Active && block.timestamp <= endAt && msg.value >= lowCapTxWei && msg.value <= hardCapTxWei && collectedWei + msg.value <= hardCapWei)

analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#1): it allows old versions
DWBTPreICO.ONE_TOKEN (/unique_chucks/39/0xfcfca7610c23b943db992d8c2610413695c23a6d.sol#556-557) is never used in DWBTPreICO
